name: 2D Shooter (danny9)
description:
I added the following:

  • Changed the GUI at Main Menu
  • Added a "Main Menu" button to the winning pause screen
  • Changed the level design on both levels 1 and 2
  • Added a brand new level 3 to the game
  • Introduced Spawners in the game
  • Used destructable rocks in level 1
  • Added a boss (1.000HP) in level 3

Credits

Brian Winn at MSU for the course and  https://free-game-assets.itch.io/2d-alien-free-sprite for the alien sprites used in the Main Menu GUI

Made by Danny Silva
